title: slicer
description: the main program which takes in one or two input images and produces as many separate output pictures of slices as are requested. The basic output options (-x, -y and -z) produce single slice pictures. The more advanced options (-a, -A and -S) produce montages of various slices. slicer outputs PPM format pictures

colour_map.title: Colour map
colour_map.description: Use different colour map from that specified in the header.

intensity_range.title: Intensity range
intensity_range.description: Specify intensity min and max for display range.

threshold_edges.title: Threshold edges
threshold_edges.description: Use specified threshold for edges (if >0 use this proportion of max-min, if <0, use the absolute value)

nearest_neighbour.title: Nearest neighbour
nearest_neighbour.description: Use nearest neighbor interpolation for output.

show_orientation.title: Show orientation
show_orientation.description: Do not put left-right labels in output

red_dot_marker.title: Red dot marker
red_dot_marker.description: Add a red dot marker to topright of image.

output_single_image.title: Output single image
output_single_image.description: Output mid-sagittal, -coronal, and -axial slices into one image.

output_sagittal_slice.title: Output sagittal slice
output_sagittal_slice.description: Output sagittal slice (if slice >0, it is a fraction of image dimension, if <0, it is absolute slice number).

output_axial_slice.title: Output axial slice
output_axial_slice.description: Output axial slice (if slice >0, it is a fraction of image dimension, if <0, it is absolute slice number).

output_coronal_slice.title: Output coronal slice
output_coronal_slice.description: Output coronal slice (if slice >0, it is a fraction of image dimension, if <0, it is absolute slice number).

output_all_axial_slices_fname.title: Output all axial slices image file name
